name: SpeedingRoad
description:
Welcome to the world of straight highway speeding.

There are six kinds of roads in the game. You can get more money by speeding on the road, so as to buy new vehicles, decorate the vehicles and go back to the road.

features:

-No less than 10 cars!

-Six different roads!

-4 different game modes!

-Unique retro atmosphere!

-More than 50 different synthetic music!

-Performance improvement of car purchase system!

-Buy new colors and new wheel systems!

-Addictive game!
